jobTitle: Senior Data Scientist - Greater Boston Area - $175K
jobDescription: Senior Data Scientist - Greater Boston Area - $175K A growing startup company in Boston is looking to hire an experienced Data Scientist to their team. This candidate should have hands on experience with coding, analytics, and predictive models. They should also be a leader with great communication as this role will require the candidate to lead their team of Data Scientists. If you are interested, please review the following requirements below and apply ASAP! Senior Data Scientist - Greater Boston Area - $175KRequirements:Experience in SQL and relational databasesExperience with coding language PythonHands on with Big Data tools such as: Hadoop, Hive, SparkKnowledge of AWSExperience with predictive analytics and data scienceHands on with predictive modeling and machine learning projectsBenefits:Fully paid medical/dental/vision insuranceWork remote401K with company matchCompetitive base salary with bonusOpportunity to work with the newest technology If you are interested in this position, please call me (Casey Carton) at 212-731-8282 or simply send me your resume to my email address - [Click Here to Email Your Resumé]. Act fast, as this opportunity will most likely be off the market in the near future.  I understand the need for discretion and would welcome the opportunity to speak to any Big Data and cloud analytics candidates that are considering a new career or job either now or in the future. Confidentiality is of the upmost importance. For more information on available BI jobs, as well as the Business Intelligence, Big data and cloud market, I can be contacted at 212-731-8282. Please see www.jeffersonfrank.com for more information.
